1378440.name: RPG Maker MZ - Shanghai Fantasy Story
1378440.description:
Journey to the heart of China with this Asian-themed pack from Ayato Sound Create! Featuring a unique synthesis of traditional Asian instruments mixed with modern production, this worldly pack will suit your Asian themed games perfectly! Whether you are looking for music for mapping, theme songs, menus or battles with Chinese Deities and Gods, this pack has you covered!

Features:

* 23 royalty-free songs in ogg, mp3, m4a, loop ogg and wav formats
* Music for many settings and scenes
* For use with RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

01 上海幻想傳記 (shanghai fantasy story)
02 崑崙（kong long)
03 異界トンネル (Other world tunnel)
04 ねじれ時間 (Twisting time)
05 幻魔鏡 (Ghost mirror)
06 宮殿 (Palace)
07 寺院 (temple)
08 吟遊詩人（minstrel)
09 ラストエンペラー (Last emperor)
10 紫禁城 (Forbidden City)
11 春節祭 (Spring Festival)
12 悠久の時 (A long time)
13 九龍城 (Kowloon City)
14 危険地帯 (Danger zone)
15 九龍の少年 (Kowloon boy)
16 時空飛行 (Beyond space-time)
17 呪符結界 (Curse mark boundary)
18 最深部 (Deepest)
19 薬屋 (shop)
20 幽鬼戦 (battle)
21 Hong Kong cyber night
22 上海ピーチ (Shanghai Peach)
23 神話 (mythology)
1378440.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
